AWARE Publications



Refereed Publications

[HW08] Sarah Heckman and Laurie Williams, " On Establishing a Benchmark for Evaluating Static Analysis Alert Prioritization and Classification Techniques," 2nd International Conference on Empirical Software Engineering and Measurement (ESEM 2008), Kaiserslauten, Germany, 2008.

[H07] Sarah Smith Heckman, "Adaptive Probabilistic Model for Ranking Code-Based Static Analysis Alerts," Doctoral Symposium, 29th International Conference on Software Engineering (ICSE 2007), Minneapolis, MN, 2007.

[HW06] Sarah Smith Heckman and Laurie Williams, "Automated Adaptive Ranking and Filtering of Static Analysis Alerts," Fast Abstract, 17th IEEE International Symposium on Software Reliability Engineering (ISSRE 2006), Raleigh, North Carolina, 2006.

[SWX05] Sarah E. Smith*, Laurie Williams, and Jun Xu, "Expediting Programmer AWAREness of Anomalous Code," Fast Abstract, 16th IEEE International Symposium on Software Reliability Engineering (ISSRE 2005), Chicago, Illinois, 2005.

* Maiden name Sarah Ellen Smith
